mapper.select: select p.station_id stationId,p.id pileId,ps.pile_state pileState, gs.gun_id gunId,gs.gun_state gunState,p.gun_num gunNum from pile_state ps,gun_state gs ,pilepara p where gs.station_id = ps.station_id and ps.pile_id = gs.pile_id and p.station_id = ps.station_id and p.id = ps.pile_id and p.pile_code = #{pileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT s.id ,s.longitude,s.latitude from pilepara p,station s where p.station_id = s.id and p.pile_code = #{pileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select dlfee_type RateType,rated_z rateZ,ratef_j SharpRate,ratef_f PeakRate, ratef_p FlatRate,ratef_g ValleyRate,rate_ser ServiceCharge from pilepara p,ratepara r where p.rate_id = r.id and pile_code = #{pileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT rtu_id from pilepara p where p.pile_code = #{pileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
